title: The Baker's Bodyguard
description: ISBN: 9780989245357 updated version found hereThis steamy, sexy, funny novella is the perfect read for the beach or a vacation!Jesse Bradley never thought she'd need help going out into the world. But, after her sisterwas kidnapped, she began to have trouble going anyplace alone. An anxiety attack would start if a stranger asked her what time it was. Before she knew it, she was making up excuses to stay inside. Where things were safe.Zach Harris was going to change all that. The steamy, sexy bodyguard got her into counseling to help her overcome her fears. He went with her everywhere helping her learn to feel safe again.Jesse and Zach both feel the chemistry sparking between them. But will there be more than just chemistry for these two?This book alternates between making you laugh and making you hot with its steamy sex scenes as Jesse and Zach navigate their way through New York City.
author: Lori Ryan
